faqs.question: How long does a typical project take?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity. A simple website takes 4-6 weeks, while complex enterprise solutions can take 3-6 months. Our average timeline is 3 months from idea to launch. We provide detailed timelines during the proposal phase.

faqs.question: What are your payment terms?
faqs.answer: We typically work with a 50% upfront payment and 50% upon completion. For larger projects, we can arrange milestone-based payments. All payment terms are discussed during the proposal phase.

faqs.question: Do you offer maintenance and support?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide 24/7 technical support and maintenance packages. Our support includes bug fixes, security updates, performance monitoring, and feature enhancements. We have ongoing partnerships with all our clients.

faqs.question: Can you work with our existing systems?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in integrating with existing systems, modernizing legacy applications, and ensuring seamless data migration. We have experience with CRM, ERP, databases, and various third-party APIs.

faqs.question: What technologies do you use?
faqs.answer: We use modern, industry-standard technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, TypeScript, AWS, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes and more. We choose the best tech stack based on your specific needs and requirements.

faqs.question: Do you sign NDAs?
faqs.answer: Yes, we're happy to sign NDAs to protect your intellectual property and confidential information. We take data security and confidentiality very seriously.

faqs.question: Where is your team located?
faqs.answer: We operate globally with a distributed team. Our leadership is based in Senegal (École Polytechnique de Thiès, UCAD graduates) but we serve clients worldwide across 20+ countries and can accommodate different time zones.

faqs.question: What is your client satisfaction rate?
faqs.answer: We maintain a 97% client satisfaction rate with 95% of clients recommending our services. We've successfully delivered 250+ projects for 50+ enterprise clients across 6+ industries.

faqs.question: Do you have experience in my industry?
faqs.answer: We have extensive experience across multiple industries including Healthcare (MIMAP clinic), E-commerce (iSaraya marketplace), Education (ASTA academy), Automotive (BMV Inspection), Transportation (Saraya Auto Rental), and more. We've served clients in 20+ countries.

testimonials.feedback: The BMV inspection platform has revolutionized how we handle vehicle inspections. The OCR technology and streamlined booking system have significantly improved our efficiency.
iSaraya has created a vibrant marketplace ecosystem. The integrated messaging and delivery management features have been game-changers for our business.
The MIMAP platform has transformed our clinic operations. Managing consultations, prescriptions, and certificates is now seamless and efficient.
ASTA has become the leading tech education platform in Senegal. Our graduates are highly sought after by employers across the region.
